algorithms.imageProcessing

Class ScaleSpaceCurve

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithms.imageProcessing.ScaleSpaceCurve

  • public class ScaleSpaceCurve
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds X(t, sigma), Y(t, sigma), k(t, sigma) and the array t where t is the range of indexes for the curve in edges, normalized to values that range from 0 to 1. Also holds information on inflection points (where the curvature is zero).
    Author:
    nichole
